body.name: ODK 40 Inch Small Computer Desk with 3 Cloth Drawers for Home Office, Vanity Desk with Storage and Hook for Bedroom, Work Desk, Study Writing Table, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 17 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Small Computer and Vanity Desk】These small computer desk for small spaces are designed with 3 fabric drawers and iron headphone hook. You can put notebook, in-ear headphones, glasses, cosmetics, jewelry, picture book and toy in the storage drawers, making the desktop tidier. The headphone hook can hang your headphone or bag firmly. Well organize your sundries. Work without mess, work with tidy. Dimensions: 19.7"D x 40"W x 31"H

【Modern Simple Style Design】Our computer desk is designed in a modern but simple style. It can match all home decor styles and is not easy out of date. The spacious tabletop space makes it easy to contain your PC, laptop, coffee cup, mini plant, keyboard, etc. There are 3 sizes for you to choose from that meet all requirements. Choose the smaller size for a bedroom, study room, or corner, and bigger ones for a larger working space.

【Sturdy & Attractive Desk Table】This small computer desk has an exquisite desktop, it is made of high-quality particleboard which is anti-scratch, waterproof, and easy to clean. This material also meet the EPA and CARB safe air standard, safe for adults and toddlers. The metal frame and corner reinforced structure provide reliable support for all-day use, weight capacity up to 110 Lbs. A must-have small space desk for home office.

【Multipurpose Desk】ODK study table is perfect for home, office, bedroom, reading room, study room, and so on. 3 sizes for different space demands, and 3 colors for matching various room decoration styles. This home office desk with storage is also a decent gift for your friends or family on festivals, birthday, new year, housewarming, back-to-school day, etc.

【Easy Assembly & After-sale Service】The desk come with detailed instructions, all parts are clearly labeled, what you need to do is following instructions step-by-step. If your ODK desk arrives damaged, missing part or scratched, please feel free to contact us, our professional customer support team will help you solve the problem within 24 hours.

【Stylish & Practical】 A clean and simple look that fits just about anywhere. Modern office desk is suitable for study room, bedroom, living room, game room, children's room, office. The Wood desk can be used as computer desk, a study desk, a gaming computer desk, an office table, a work desk, a home desk, a workstation. The large space and comfortable study table design allow you to complete whatever you want at home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Considerate Details Make It Stand Out Desk With 3 Fabric Drawers The desk is designed with 3 easy to assemble fabric drawers. Perfect for placing your documents, office or school supplies, gaming equipment etc. Versatile Hook A versatile hook can be used to hang earphones, bags and other small items. Adjustable non-slip foot pads Not only protect your floor from being scratched, but also ensure stability on uneven ground. Desktop The desktop is anti-scratching, waterproof and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars practical furniture piece designed to enhance your workspace
reviews.reviewText: The ODK 40 Inch Computer Desk with 3 Drawers and Large Storage Shelves is a versatile and practical furniture piece designed to enhance your workspace. Here's an overview of its features and benefits:1. Spacious Work Surface:The desk offers a generous 40-inch-wide work surface, providing ample space for your computer, keyboard, mouse, and other office essentials. This ample surface area allows for comfortable multitasking and easy organization of your work materials.2. Three Drawers:Equipped with three drawers, this desk offers convenient storage solutions for your office supplies, stationery, files, and personal belongings. The drawers help you keep your workspace clutter-free and organized, promoting efficiency and productivity.3. Large Storage Shelves:In addition to the drawers, the desk features large storage shelves. These open shelves are perfect for displaying books, decorative items, or office decor. The open design ensures easy access to your items and adds a decorative touch to your workspace.4. Sturdy Construction:The desk is constructed from high-quality materials, ensuring durability and stability. Its sturdy build can support the weight of your computer and other accessories, providing a reliable and long-lasting workspace solution.5. Easy Assembly:The desk is designed for easy assembly, with clear instructions and all necessary hardware included. This simplifies the setup process, allowing you to quickly enjoy your new workspace without hassle.6. Modern Design:The desk features a modern and stylish design, making it a great addition to various interior styles. Its clean lines and functional layout complement both contemporary and traditional decor, enhancing the aesthetics of your home or office.7. Multi-Purpose Use:This desk is versatile and can be used for various purposes, including as a computer desk, writing desk, study table, or even a vanity table. Its adaptable design makes it suitable for home offices, bedrooms, living rooms, and other spaces.In summary, the ODK 40 Inch Computer Desk with 3 Drawers and Large Storage Shelves offers a well-designed and practical solution for your workspace needs. Its spacious surface, ample storage options, sturdy construction, and modern design make it an excellent choice for individuals seeking a functional and stylish desk for their home or office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great buy!
reviews.reviewText: This was the easiest assembly of a product we have purchased in a long time. The screws were packaged in order of assembly and there were extras! The desk is solid structurally and the veneer is attractive. It was very inexpensive in my opinion but looks fabulous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some steps could have been pre-assembled
reviews.reviewText: It seems durable, stable and well designed. I'm not crazy about cloth drawers holding much weight. Not easy to assemble. One screw hole would not accept any screw at all, but it only holds a corner of the top down and I never move things using a table top. We desperately needed to add a third desk to that office and it fits nicely. I added those little statuettes in the photo for drama. Should cost $60. Good leg room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: We needed a small desk for the very corner of our front sitting room. We have 2 teenagers that needed a place to do their homework, but I didnt want a huge desk taking up much of our living space. This is literally PERFECT! The size is large enough to easily hold their books, laptop, and notebooks. The drawers hold so much items and I love that there are 3 different drawers - this has allowed us to organize our different office supplies in a very easy to find manner.We also have 2 toddlers in the house and we were able to attach baby proof locks to the drawers to keep the toddlers out of all the office supplies. So if this is something that would benefit you, I did want to mention that its possible and works well.There hasn't been any chips or cracks and the install process was very easy. I installed it at 30 weeks pregnant and I had no issues at all.I highly recommend for anyone looking for a fantastic compact desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great solid desk, easy assembly !
reviews.reviewText: First of all, it survived a long journey from California to Florida intact and no damage.its well packed and boxed to ship. Upon opening, most parts are either bagged or next to Styrofoam for cushioning. Nothing scratched, screws are bagged by size..bonus: they include Xtra screws of every size needed, thats a plus !Desk frame is all powder finished steel ..thats a great quality bonusThe desk is about an hour or 2 to completely assemble. No tools needed, they supply those also.After I was finished, I'm amazed it is so well designed and shows durability in its components.I recommend this desk highly, its a very nice desk...A+++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Drawers aren’t wood
reviews.reviewText: I love this desk!! it has so much room and is a bit taller than my last desk, looks so chic. Be warned the drawers are soft, like those storage cubes, but the front of them is wood so they look like the rest of the desk, i didn’t notice this so just something to consider :) but they are super nice and held up by metal bearings underneath

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't ask for more. Great price, was easy to put together, mostly made with metal and is very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wonderful desk, and the drawers are very long and a good size, great for storage! Very easy to build. One thing I will say is that the middle drawer, doesn’t really go in all the way? Maybe it was my fault but I can’t find my building error. Other than that it’s overall a great deal, I recommend!
